title: If the United States were ever to get into a World War 3 scenerio involving a Nuclear War, would Wilmington be a safe place to live ?
text:
FEMA put out a booklet in 1990 detailing the potential for various
natural and manmade hazards in the U.S. Basically, our region is
pretty much ground zero for a nuclear attack in the event of war
because of the military installations near Wilmington. Here's a link
to the booklet, which was put online by a survivalist organization:
http://www.survivalring.org/FEMA196.pdf
